description: This file is a client-side API wrapper for a Quote Extractor backend service, providing functions to check health, extract quotes from files/transcripts, and format quotes for social media.
external_files: fetch API (built-in in browsers or polyfilled in node environment)

methods.name: healthCheck()
methods.description: Checks the health of the backend service.

methods.name: extractQuotes({ file, transcript, options })
methods.description: Posts files or transcript data to extract quotes from media files or transcripts.

methods.name: formatQuotes({ quotes, platform = 'generic', hashtag = null, url = null, style = null, max_chars = null })
methods.description: Formats a list of quotes for social media platforms with specified options.

ctags.name: extractQuotes
ctags.pattern: /^export async function extractQuotes({ file, transcript, options }) {$/

ctags.name: formatQuotes
ctags.pattern: /^export async function formatQuotes({ quotes, platform = 'generic', hashtag = null, url = null, s/
ctags.signature: ({ quotes, platform = 'generic', hashtag = null, url = null, style = null, max_chars = null })
